newsitem.title: USA: Cotelligent Q2 pro forma shr $0.15 vs $0.12.
newsitem.headline: Cotelligent Q2 pro forma shr $0.15 vs $0.12.

text.p: Three and Six Months Ended September 30, 1996 and 1995
NOTES: (1) Excludes revenues of $21,836 of four companies acquired simultaneously with the closing of the company's initial public offering.
(2) Includes $509,000 of non-recurring transactions costs incurred in connection with acquisitions accounted for as poolings of interests.
(3) Pro forma operating income was $1,264 and pro forma net income was $727.

(4) Historical earnings per share for the periods presented have not been presented because it is not considered meaningful as a result of the initial public offering and acquisitions accounted for as poolings of interests.
(5) Excludes revenues of $30,638 of four companies acquired simultaneously with the closing of the initial public offering.
(6) Includes $754,000 of non-recurring transaction costs incurred in connection with acquisitions accounted for as poolings of interests.
(7) Pro forma operating income was $2,414 and pro forma net income was $1,389.

Pro forma data reflect adjustments for: (i) compensation differentials to former owners and employees of the acquired companies (fiscal 1997 and fiscal 1996); (ii) termination of contributions to retirement plans (fiscal 1996); (iii) incremental selling, general and administrative costs associated with the company's corporate activities (fiscal 1996); (iv) removal of non-recurring transaction costs associated with certain of the acquired companies (fiscal 1997); and (v) income taxes as if the entities were combined and subject to the effective federal and state statutory rates throughout the periods discussed (fiscal 1997 and fiscal 1996).
